content: legs take your needle and sew through both sides to tighten the legs to make pant legs pocket red chain 10 in 2nd chain single_crochet 9 1-6 9sc ch1 and turn 9 attach between row 8 and 2 of the frontside of the overalls blackberry begin in purple 1 4sc in magic_ring 2 4inc 8 3-4 4sc 8 fo and leave tail long enough for finishing stem change to green 1 decx4 4 2 slip_stitch ch3 slip_stitch into same stitch x4 fo and leave tail long enough for sewing attach the blackberry how you want mine is in the pocket of the overalls but also could be sewn to the arm to make it look like it is holding it
